Welcome to Camrose Neighbor Aid Center

Contact Us (Call to action)

Who We Are

Camrose Neighbor Aid Center is a nonprofit Christian organization dedicated to providing essential services to individuals and families in need within our community.

We serve with an attitude of:

WE CARE - WE LISTEN - WE RESPOND

Our Mission

Hands linked in Christ's name to meet the needs of others.

Featured Programs

Supporting our community through various initiatives

  • Food Bank Services Learn more about Food Bank Services

    Providing essential food supplies to those experiencing food insecurity in our community.

    Learn More about Food Bank Services

  • Food for Kids Learn more about Food for Kids

    Serving approximately 1,000 children monthly through breakfast clubs in local schools.

    Learn More about Food for Kids

  • Martha's Table Learn more about Martha's Table

    Free soup and sandwich program serving 20-400 people twice weekly since 1998.

    Learn More about Martha's Table

  • Medical Transportation Learn more about Medical Transportation

    Providing essential transportation services for specialist medical appointments in Edmonton.

    Learn More about Medical Transportation

  • Emergency Financial Assistance Learn more about Emergency Financial Assistance

    One-time emergency intervention for urgent financial crises, with repayment opportunities.

    Learn More about Emergency Financial Assistance

  • Referral Services Learn more about Referral Services

    Connecting individuals with additional support resources and community services.

    Learn More about Referral Services

Make a Difference

Join us in building a stronger, more caring community. Your support can help transform lives.
